section.name: About Model Ontology
section.p: The PDS4 Model Ontology component encapsulates the Protégé ontology instances for the PDS4 information and data model. This package uses the Maven plugin "model-dmdocument" to generate documentation and other artifcats from the ontology and packages this output (including generated, DM documentation, classes and attribute definitions) into a JAR file.

ol.li: Place the Protégé output ontology instances in the src/ontology directory. (The output must go into a Data subdirectory beneath src/ontology due to the way the DM-Document plugin assumes things work).
Commit these changes to revision control (with svn commit, for example).
Run mvn jar:jar to generate a target/model-ontology-VERSION.jar file that contains all of the generate artifacts.

section.p: Please send comments, change requests and bug reports to the PDS Operator at pds_operator@jpl.nasa.gov.
